text: Tennis is an event at the Island Games, the biennial multi-sports event for island nations, territories and dependencies. Tennis has been played in the Island Games since 1991 by both Men and Women. Not every games has included a tennis competition. * Member Islands may bring a maximum of 5 men and 5 women players to the Games. * Singles - a maximum of 4 Men and 4 Women competitors per Member Island * Doubles - a maximum of 2 Men and 2 Women pairs per Member Island * Mixed Doubles - a maximum of 4 pairs per Member Island * Team - A maximum of 1 Men's Team and 1 Ladies Team each to consist of a maximum of 4 players and a minimum of 2 players. * Minimum age - 14 ==Events== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !
